column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The classic tonkotsu ramen is ramen noodle in a pork-based broth complemented with char siu (Japanese grilled pork)
column4: a Japanese ramen either succeeds or fails depending on the broth
column5: and while Jinya's tonkotsu broth is up to my standard for flavor
column6: the broth lacks the richness that I had expected. Char siu is also sadly lacking in flavor. However
column7: the firm noodle definitely compensates these faults
column8: and the seasoned egg (an often overlooked component) actually steals the highlight.
